description: The Digital Product Passport is a data record that summarizes the components, materials and chemical substances or information on repairability, spare parts or professional disposal for a product. The data comes from all phases of the product life cycle and can be used for various purposes in all these phases (design, production, use, disposal). Structuring environmental data in a standardized, comparable format enables all actors in the value and supply chain to work together towards a circular economy. This data model is based on the new proposed Ecodesign Regulation (ESPR-2022) and is continuously adapted to the basic conditions over time.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Enumeration with draft, approved, invalid or expired.
A time stamp in the format (yyyy-mm-dd) with or without time zone.
Identification of the company or location of the company. In the CATENA-X network the BPN/L identification is needed.
Constraint with a pattern which ensures that the EORI number starts with two alphanumeric characters, followed by two alphabetic characters, and ends with 2 to 15 alphanumeric characters.
Economic operator of the passport.

id.description: The identification of the economic operator of the passport.

eori.description: Any economic operator established in the customs territory of the Union needs, for customs purposes, an EORI number. EORI stands for economic operators registration and identification number.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic for the passport metadata of the digital product passport.

version.description: The current version of the product passport.

status.description: The current status of the product passport declared through either: draft, approved, invalid or expired.

validityDate.description: The timestamp for the product passport until when it is available.

issueDate.description: The timestamp for the product passport since when it is available.

economicOperator.description: The economic operator of the passport.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Constraint to limit the input to a valid ECLASS number. The constraint ensures that each pair of digits is followed by a hyphen, resulting in a pattern like "00-00-00-00" where the zeros can be replaced by any digit.
Characteristic to describe the ECLASS typology of a product.

code.description: The associated product category CODE according to ECLASS.

definition.description: The associated product category NAME according to ECLASS.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Pa.description: Part Name in string format from the respective system in the value chain

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic to further describe product.

class.description: The associated product category according to ECLASS. The ECLASS is the worldwide reference data standard for classifying and clearly describing products and services.

name.description: The name of the product type.

nameAtManufacturer.description: Name of the part as assigned by the manufacturer

nameAtCustomer.description: Name of the part as assigned by the customer

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: A constraint that limits the title to 100 characters.
The activities of putting the product into service in form of an enumeration with the values Inspection, Maintenance, Repair, Preventive Maintenance, Accident and Other.
Entity describing a list of entries of the service history with title, text, activities and dates.

title.description: The title of the data object with a maximum of 100 characters.

description.description: A short description of the maintenance content.

date.description: The dates when the product was put into service, repair etc.

activity.description: The activities of putting the product into service in form of an enumeration with the values Inspection, Maintenance, Repair, Preventive Maintenance, Accident and Other.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: A list of entries of the service history.
Entity with the attributes partId, producerId and partName to describe a list of spare parts.

partId.description: The identification of spare parts available for the product.

producerId.description: The identifier of the producer. In the CATENA-X network the BPN identification of the spare part producer is needed.

name.description: The name of the spare part.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: The list of spare parts with different identifiers.
Enumeration of possible units of concentration with percent, volume percent, parts per thousand, parts per million, parts per billion and parts per trillion.
Characteristic with two possible values.

left.description: Input should be two values, the highest and te lowest of the range.

right.description: Concentration of substances of concern at the level of the product.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Entity to describe a list of properties regarding a substance of concern such as the substance name, location, unit and concentration.

name.description: In accordance with the ESPR specification the name of the substances of concern which is present in the product have to be declared.

location.description: The location of the substances of concern within the product.

unit.description: Units of concentration are percent, volume percent, parts per thousand, parts per million, parts per billion and  parts per trillion.

concentration.description: Concentration of substances of concern at the level of the product.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic for a list of substances of concern.
Characteristic to describe aspects which are connected with the handling of the product.

maintenanceHistory.description: The maintenance history of the product with dates, titles and descriptions.

spareParts.description: The list of spare parts available for the product from a supplier.

substanceOfConcern.description: Details to the substance of concern.

reusablePackaging.description: Definition of whether the product uses a reuse system. The values true or false are allowed.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Enumeration with the values first life and second life.
Entity with properties materialName, percentage and flags for the possibility to recycle and renew the material.

name.description: The material name which is part of the product.

recycled.description: A flag if the material is recovered recyclate content from the product.

renewable.description: Flag if the material is made of natural resources that can be replenished. Renewable resources are those that can be reproduced by physical, chemical, or mechanical processes. These are the kind of resources that can be regenerated throughout time. Forest wood, for example, can be grown through reforestation.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: A list of different materials in the product.
The list of critical raw materials in the product (CRM) which is specified by EU.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_PositiveEm.description: Only positive emission values (>0) are valid

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Enumeration of PCR (Product Category Rule) operators as specified in the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative. WBCSD specific extension for example in Catena-X.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_NonEmptySt.description: Constraint for ensuring that a string has at least one character.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_RuleName.description: Name of a rule applied by a specified operator as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

ruleName.description: Name of a rule applied by a specific operator as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_RuleNamesT.description: Constraint for defining a non-empty set of rule names as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Entity for defining a product or sector specific rule of a product carbon footprint as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

extWBCSD_operator.description: Operator of PCR (Product Category Rule)/ PSR (Product Specific Rule) as specified in the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative. WBCSD specific extension, in Catena-X for example must always be "Other".

productOrSectorSpecificRules.description: Product-specific or sector-specific set of rules used for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions applied from the specified operator as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

extWBCSD_otherOperatorName.description: Other operator of PCR (Product Category Rule)/ PSR (Product Specific Rule) as specified in the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative. WBCSD specific extension, in Catena-X for example specified by a default value.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_ProductOrS.description: Characteristic for defining the set of product or sector specific rules of a product carbon footprint as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.pcf_4.0.0_CrossSecto.description: Characteristic for defining the enumeration of valid accounting standards used for product carbon footprint calculation as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Carbon Footprint Characteristic with sustainability information.

carbonContentTotal.description: Total carbon content per declared unit in context of a product carbon footprint as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook.

productOrSectorSpecificRules.description: Product or sector specific rules applied for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions, e.g. PCRs (Product Category Rules), including operators or pubishers and according rule names as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

crossSectoralStandard.description: Discloses a cross-sectoral standard applied for calculating or allocating GHG (Greenhouse Gas) emissions as specified in the Catena-X PCF Rulebook in accordance with the technical specifications for PCF Data Exchange (Version 2.0.0) from the WBCSD (World Business Council for Sustainable Development)/ PACT initiative.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic which describes relevant information for the sustainability of the product.

state.description: Status of the product (first life or second life).

material.description: Information on different materials in the product.

critical.description: The list of critical raw materials in the product (CRM) which is specified by EU.

carbonFootprint.description: Carbon Footprint property with sustainability information.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic for the expected product lifetime (lifespan).

unit.description: The unit of the expected lifetime of a product from the unit catalog.

value.description: The value of the expected lifetime of a product.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.physical_dime.description: a measurement value given in the unit kilogram
a measurement for a lenght given in the unit millimetre
Describes the physical dimensions of then entity.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Defines a set of specific characteristics of a product.

physicalDimensionsProperty.description: Describes the physical dimensions of then entity.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Commercial information of the product.

placedOnMarket.description: Date on  when the product is put in the market.

warranty.description: Commercial warranty period of the product (coupled to the Vehicle) in months. Durability and reliability of the product or its components as expressed through the product’s guaranteed lifetime, technical lifetime, mean time between failures, indication of real use information on the product, resistance to stresses or aging mechanisms.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Manufacturing information.

facilityId.description: The facility Identification, where the main manufacturing took place.

manufacturerId.description: The main manufacturer, if different from the passport owner.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Operational information of the product.

importer.description: The importer of the product, if different from the owner of the passport.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: This pattern allows for matching any GTIN version by specifying the required number of digits for each version.
Code entity with code name and value.

value.description: The code value of the specific code.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: A list of additional codes.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Ke.description:
The key characteristic of a local identifier. A specific subset of keys is predefined, but additionally any other custom key is allowed. Predefined keys (to be used when applicable):
- "manufacturerId" - The Business Partner Number (BPN) of the manufacturer. Value: BPN-Nummer
- "partInstanceId" - The identifier of the manufacturer for the serialized instance of the part, e.g. the serial number
- "batchId" - The identifier of the batch, to which the serialzed part belongs
- "van" - The anonymized vehicle identification number (VIN). Value: anonymized VIN according to OEM anonymization rules. Note: If the key "van" is available, "partInstanceId" must also be available and hold the identical value.
A list of key value pairs for local identifiers, which are composed of a key and a corresponding value.

key.description: The key of a local identifier.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Lo.description: A single serialized part may have multiple attributes, that uniquely identify a that part in a specific dataspace (e.g. the manufacturer`s dataspace)

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Identification information of the product.

gtin.description: GTIN stands for Global Trade Item Number. It is a unique and internationally recognized identifier used to identify products in the global marketplace. GTINs are typically encoded in barcodes and are used by retailers, manufacturers, and suppliers to track and manage their products throughout the supply chain. Valid inputs are all GTIN versions (GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13, and GTIN-14).

additionalCode.description: Codes for identification can be for example commodity codes. In Europe, two commonly used codes for goods classification are the Harmonized System (HS) code and the Combined Nomenclature (CN). Other codes can also be given.

localIdentifiers.description: A local identifier enables identification of a part in a specific dataspace, but is not unique in Catena-X dataspace. Multiple local identifiers may exist.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Enumeration of possible quantities in a batch.
The value of the quantity.
Quantity of the product.

unit.description: Quantity refers to the number of units or items of a product being bought, sold, manufactured, or stored as a batch.If the product is a single item choose the unit "unit:piece". All possible units are pieces, gram, kilogram, millilitres, litres, cubic meters, meters or square meters.

value.description: Quantity refers to the number of units or items of a product being bought, sold, manufactured, or stored. If the product is not a batch, choose the unit piece and value 1.0.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Pa.description: The part ID is a multi-character string, ususally assigned by an ERP system

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic for registration information such as the identification at the customer and the manufacturer.

customerPartId.description: Part ID as assigned by the manufacturer of the part. The Part ID identifies the part (as designed) in the customer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number.

manufacturerPartId.description: Part ID as assigned by the manufacturer of the part. The Part ID identifies the part (as designed) in the manufacturer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Pr.description: Regular Expression that ensures a three-letter code

urn_samm_io.catenax.serial_part_1.0.0_Ma.description: Characteristic to describe manufacturing related data

date.description: Timestamp of the manufacturing date as the final step in production process (e.g. final quality check, ready-for-shipment event)

country.description: Country code where the part was manufactured

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Characteristic for serialization information.

quantity.description: Quantity refers to the number of units or items of a product being bought, sold, manufactured, or stored. It is an important factor in inventory management, supply chain logistics, and pricing calculations.

registration.description: Registration information such as the identification at the customer and the manufacturer.

manufacturingInformation.description: Information from manufacturing process, such as manufacturing date and manufacturing country

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Enumeration of different source names.
Characteristic for different documents.

content.description: The content of the document e.g a link.

category.description: The category in which the document can be sorted.

type.description: The type of content which can be expected in the "content" property. Examples are a link, pdf, excel, etc.

header.description: The header as a short description of the document with a maximum of 100 characters.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Entity for document sources of a product.

name.description: The source name as an enumeration.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: A list of documents.
Characteristic for the different mandatory sources.

safetyPackaging.description: Document regarding the packaging of the product.

safetyTransportation.description: Document regarding the safe transportation of the product.

substanceOfConcernDisassembly.description: Document regarding the disassembly processes for the substances of concern.

declarationOfConformity.description: Compliance documentation and information required under this Regulation or other Union law applicable to the product, such as the declaration of conformity, technical documentation or conformity certificates.

substanceOfConcernInstruction.description: Instructions regarding the substances of concern.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: The sources of the product.

optional.description: Optional sources for the product. Optional sources can be a document regarding tool and process, assembly and disassembly, repair and installation, user manual, End of Life, return and disposal, expected waste generation, product packaging, positioning, waste prevention or sustainability information.

mandatory.description: Mandatory document and sources of the product.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Link to the unit catalog with all possible units in the format "unit:xxx".

Data type that describe the content of the attributes children and data. In case "object" is selected in the enumeration, the children field will be used in the AdditionalDataEntity instead of the "data" property. If it is an other type, the content will be specified in "data" as a string.
Characteristic for the data type.

typeUnit.description: Choose a unit type from the unit catalog, or if the property "children" is filled, leave empty.

dataType.description: Data type that describe the content of the attributes children and data. In case "object" is selected in the enumeration, the children field will be used in the AdditionalDataEntity instead of the "data" property. If it is an other type, the content will be specified in "data" as a string.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: Entity with additional data. Properties are label, description, type, data and children. Either the fields data or children filled. Children constructs a hierarchy with the same attributes. Data is filled as the end of an path/leaf.

label.description: The human readable name of the attribute.

description.description: The description of the attribute context.

type.description: The complex description of the type.

data.description: The content from the attribute which is a depended of the data type and typeUnit.

urn_samm_io.catenax.generic.digital_prod.description: List of additional data.

metadata.description: The passport metadata of the digital product passport such as status and validity.

typology.description: Properties further describing the product type.

handling.description: Properties connected with the handling of the product.

sustainability.description: Properties which are relevant for the sustainability of the product.

characteristics.description: Defines specific characteristics of a product.

identification.description: Identification information of the product, especially identifiers and codes.

sources.description: Different sources in relation to the product.

additionalData.description: Data in form of open fields which need to be transferred in addition.
